        logger.info(<span class="hljs-string">"Initializing GCP Vector Store Connector (Mock/Local backend)..."</span>)

    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title">ingest_documents</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self, texts: <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>[<span class="hljs-built_in">str</span>]</span>):</span>

        self.vector_store = FAISS.from_documents(docs, self.embeddings)
        logger.info(<span class="hljs-string">f"Successfully indexed <span class="hljs-subst">{<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(texts)}</span> documents into vector store."</span>)

        <span class="hljs-comment"># Return a retriever that acts like Vertex AI</span>

            {<span class="hljs-string">"flight_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"BA249"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"origin"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"LHR"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"destination"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"JFK"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"status"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"Delayed"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"price"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">820</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"dep_time"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"10:00"</span>},
            {<span class="hljs-string">"flight_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"DL505"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"origin"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"LAX"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"destination"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"HND"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"status"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"On Time"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"price"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1200</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"dep_time"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"13:30"</span>},
            {<span class="hljs-string">"flight_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"AA990"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"origin"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MIA"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"destination"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"GRU"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"status"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"Cancelled"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"price"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">600</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"dep_time"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"21:15"</span>},

    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title">search_flights</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self, origin: <span class="hljs-built_in">str</span>, destination: <span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span>):</span>
        <span class="hljs-string">"""
        Search for flights between two airport codes.
        """</span>
        origin = origin.upper()
        destination = destination.upper()
        results = [f <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> f <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> self.flights <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> f[<span class="hljs-string">"origin"</span>] == origin <span class="hljs-keyword">and</span> f[<span class="hljs-string">"destination"</span>] == destination]
        
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">not</span> results:
            <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> json.dumps({<span class="hljs-string">"message"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">f"No flights found from <span class="hljs-subst">{origin}</span> to <span class="hljs-subst">{destination}</span>."</span>})
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> json.dumps(results)

    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title">get_flight_status</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self, flight_id: <span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span>):</span>
        <span class="hljs-string">"""
        Check real-time status of a specific flight ID.
        """</span>
        flight_id = flight_id.upper()
        <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> f <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> self.flights:
            <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> f[<span class="hljs-string">"flight_id"</span>] == flight_id:

                    <span class="hljs-string">"status"</span>: f[<span class="hljs-string">"status"</span>],
                    <span class="hljs-string">"departure"</span>: f[<span class="hljs-string">"dep_time"</span>]
                })
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> json.dumps({<span class="hljs-string">"error"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"Flight ID not found."</span>})

    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title">book_flight</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self, flight_id: <span class="hljs-built_in">str</span>, passenger_name: <span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span>):</span>

        flight = <span class="hljs-built_in">next</span>((f <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> f <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> self.flights <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> f[<span class="hljs-string">"flight_id"</span>] == flight_id), <span class="hljs-literal">None</span>)
        
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">not</span> flight:

        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> flight[<span class="hljs-string">"status"</span>] == <span class="hljs-string">"Cancelled"</span>:
            <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> json.dumps({<span class="hljs-string">"error"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"Cannot book. Flight is cancelled."</span>})

<span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> src.rag_pipeline <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> RAGPipeline

<span class="hljs-comment"># Initialize Services</span>
flight_api = FlightAPI()
rag_pipeline = RAGPipeline()

<span class="hljs-comment"># --- Define Tools ---</span>

<span class="hljs-meta">@tool</span>
<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title">lookup_policy</span>(<span class="hljs-params">query: <span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span>):</span>
    <span class="hljs-string">"""Search the aviation knowledge base for policies on baggage, pets, check-in, and refunds."""</span>
    retriever_func = rag_pipeline.get_retriever_tool()
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> retriever_func(query)

<span class="hljs-meta">@tool</span>
<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title">search_flights</span>(<span class="hljs-params">origin: <span class="hljs-built_in">str</span>, destination: <span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span>):</span>
    <span class="hljs-string">"""Search for available flights between two cities (e.g., JFK to LHR)."""</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> flight_api.search_flights(origin, destination)

<span class="hljs-meta">@tool</span>
<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title">check_flight_status</span>(<span class="hljs-params">flight_id: <span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span>):</span>
    <span class="hljs-string">"""Check the real-time status (delayed, on time) of a specific flight ID (e.g., UA101)."""</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> flight_api.get_flight_status(flight_id)

<span class="hljs-meta">@tool</span>
<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title">book_flight_ticket</span>(<span class="hljs-params">flight_id: <span class="hljs-built_in">str</span>, passenger_name: <span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span>):</span>
    <span class="hljs-string">"""Book a flight given a flight ID and passenger name. Returns a PNR."""</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> flight_api.book_flight(flight_id, passenger_name)

tools = [lookup_policy, search_flights, check_flight_status, book_flight_ticket]

<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title">get_agent_executor</span>():</span>
    llm = ChatOpenAI(model=<span class="hljs-string">"gpt-4o-mini"</span>, temperature=<span class="hljs-number">0</span>)

        (<span class="hljs-string">"system"</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"You are an intelligent Aviation Assistant. "</span>
                   <span class="hljs-string">"You verify flight statuses, book tickets, and answer policy questions. "</span>

<span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span> <span class="hljs-title">GCPVectorStoreConnector</span>:</span>
    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title">__init__</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self</span>):</span>

        self.embeddings = FakeEmbeddings(size=<span class="hljs-number">1536</span>)

class="mat-expansion-panel-body"><!----><pre _ngcontent-ng-c1118674081="" class="ng-star-inserted">    <code _ngcontent-ng-c1118674081=""># Aviation RAG Chatbot 

A full-stack AI application capable of tracking flights, booking tickets, and answering aviation policy questions using Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG).

This project utilizes **LangChain** <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> orchestration, simulated **Google Cloud Vertex AI** <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> vector search, and a realistic **Flight API**.

##  Features

<span class="hljs-number">1.</span>  **Hybrid Routing**: Intelligently switches between RAG (<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> general questions) and API Tools (<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">real</span>-time data).
<span class="hljs-number">2.</span>  **RAG Pipeline**: Ingests aviation manuals (Baggage, Pets, Check-in rules) into a vector store <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> policy lookup.
<span class="hljs-number">3.</span>  **Flight Tools**:
    *   <span class="hljs-string">`search_flights(origin, destination)`</span>
    *   <span class="hljs-string">`check_flight_status(flight_id)`</span>
    *   <span class="hljs-string">`book_flight(flight_id, name)`</span>
<span class="hljs-number">4.</span>  **GCP Ready**: Designed to interact with Google Cloud services, using a simulation layer <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> easy local testing.
<span class="hljs-number">5.</span>  **Interactive UI**: Includes both a CLI tool and a Streamlit-based web <span class="hljs-keyword">interface</span>.

##  Installation

<span class="hljs-number">1.</span>  **Clone the repository**:
    <span class="hljs-string">``</span><span class="hljs-string">`bash
    git clone https://github.com/jay8patel/aviation-rag-chatbot.git
    cd aviation-rag-chatbot
    `</span><span class="hljs-string">``</span>

<span class="hljs-number">2.</span>  **Create a virtual environment**:
    <span class="hljs-string">``</span><span class="hljs-string">`bash
    # Windows
    python -m venv venv
    venv\Scripts\activate

    # Mac/Linux
    python3 -m venv venv
    source venv/bin/activate
    `</span><span class="hljs-string">``</span>

<span class="hljs-number">3.</span>  **Install dependencies**:
    <span class="hljs-string">``</span><span class="hljs-string">`bash
    pip install -r requirements.txt
    `</span><span class="hljs-string">``</span>

<span class="hljs-number">4.</span>  **Set up Environment**:
    You will need an OpenAI API key. Set it in your terminal or a <span class="hljs-string">`.env`</span> file.
    <span class="hljs-string">``</span><span class="hljs-string">`bash
    # Windows PowerShell
    $env:OPENAI_API_KEY="sk-your-key-here"

    # Mac/Linux
    export OPENAI_API_KEY="sk-your-key-here"
    `</span><span class="hljs-string">``</span>

##  Usage

### Option <span class="hljs-number">1</span>: CLI Chatbot (Quickest Test)
Run the bot directly in your terminal:
<span class="hljs-string">``</span><span class="hljs-string">`bash
python main.py</span></code>
